means: 露兜树； （用于编织的）露兜叶纤维

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这是露兜树属(Pandanus)中，唯一具有香料价值的植物。成份药理活性最佳作用︰生物效价 (仅供参考，请勿取代正统医疗)。

in the Indonesia it is served warm with palm sugar syrup that has been flavored with pandanus leaves and ginger .印尼的豆花会加棕榈树糖浆，用露兜树叶和生姜调味。

means.word_mean: 1. fiber from leaves of the pandanus tree; used for woven articles (such as mats)
2. any of various Old World tropical palmlike trees having huge prop roots and edible conelike fruits and leaves like pineapple leaves
